insert.insertTest: INSERT INTO HOTKEY_INFO VALUES (#{hotkeyNumber}, #{userKey}, '',  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
insert.setAlarm: INSERT INTO ALARM_INFO VALUES (to_char(current_timestamp, 'YYYYMMDDHH12MISS')||'_'||#{userKey}, #{userKey}, #{exchange}, #{coin}, #{price}, #{email}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'N', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
insert.startHotkey: INSERT INTO HOTKEY_INFO VALUES (#{hotkeyNumber}, #{userKey}, '',  CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

select.checkHotkey: SELECT COUNT(*) AS check_sum FROM HOTKEY_INFO WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey}
select.getHotkeyMenuList: SELECT HOTKEY_NUMBER, MENU FROM HOTKEY_INFO WHERE USER_KEY = #{userKey} ORDER BY HOTKEY_NUMBER
select.getHotkeyMenu: SELECT MENU FROM HOTKEY_INFO WHERE HOTKEY_NUMBER = #{hotkeyNumber} AND USER_KEY = #{userKey}

update.setHotkey: UPDATE HOTKEY_INFO SET MENU = #{menu}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE HOTKEY_NUMBER = #{hotkeyNumber} AND USER_KEY = #{userKey}
